text.div:
TimePeriod Logical Model

A period of time defined by a start and end time, date, or year. If the start date/time is missing, the start of the period is not known. If the end date/time is missing, it means that the period is ongoing.

name: TimePeriod
title: shr-core-TimePeriod
description:
A period of time defined by a start and end time, date, or year.
If the start date/time is missing, the start of the period is not known. If the end date/time is missing, it means that the period is ongoing.

element.definition:
A period of time defined by a start and end time, date, or year.
If the start date/time is missing, the start of the period is not known. If the end date/time is missing, it means that the period is ongoing.

element.short: The time at which something is to take effect, start, or did start. Boundary is considered inclusive.
element.definition: The time at which something is to take effect, start, or did start. Boundary is considered inclusive.

element.short: The time at which something is to end or did end. Boundary is considered inclusive.
element.definition: The time at which something is to end or did end. Boundary is considered inclusive.
